mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person_info (surname, given_name, middle_name, birthdate, sex) VALUES ( #{personInfoObj.surname}, #{personInfoObj.givenName}, #{personInfoObj.middleName}, #{personInfoObj.birthdate}, #{personInfoObj.sex} )
mapper.select: SELECT pi.person_info_id, pi.given_name, pi.middle_name, pi.birthdate, pi.sex FROM person_info pi JOIN passports p ON pi.person_info_id = p.person_info_id WHERE p.passport_number = #{passportNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE person_info SET surname = #{personInfoObj.surname}, given_name = #{personInfoObj.givenName}, middle_name = #{personInfoObj.middleName}, birthdate = #{personInfoObj.birthdate}, sex = #{personInfoObj.sex} WHERE person_info_id = #{personInfoObj.personInfoId}
